messages.title: LABOUR'S PLAN FOR JOBS
messages.content: Under the Conservatives, the number of 18-24 year olds claiming unemployment benefits in our area has gone up 300% over the past year. Labour's plan will guarantee jobs in our area by creating thousands of new apprenticeships.

messages.title: NHS EMERGENCY: SERVICES IN CRISIS
messages.content: Labour's plan will bring Britain's health service back to good health. NHS has been run into crisis by the Conservatives and Lib Dems, with people waiting longer for treatment and staff working in under pressure environments. Labour has pledged to inject £2.5 billion into the NHS to recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, guaranteeing an appointment within 48 hours.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's plan will guarantee jobs in our area by creating thousands of new apprenticeships.
Labour will invest £2.5 billion into the NHS to recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, ensuring an appointment within 48 hours.
Labour promises to freeze energy bills until 2017 and ensure the big energy firms reform.
Labour has a plan to support renters, including banning letting agent fees for tenants and introducing three-year stable rental contracts.

issues.economy: The leaflet mentions that the current government has increased national debt and made the economy worse, implying Labour's approach would better handle these issues.
issues.health: Labour plans to bring the NHS back to good health with a £2.5 billion investment for more nurses and GPs.

housing.content: Labour has a plan to support renters, including banning letting agent fees for tenants and introducing three-year stable rental contracts.

contactInformation.address: Labour Party, Philip Coyne Labour Rooms, Nelson Street, Otley, LS21 1EZ

images.caption: £150,000,000 millions - The real story behind Tory cuts
